title: Clarrie's Ranch
creator_credit: Csilla Csongvay, Matt Blackwood, Jessica Scott and ACMI
brief_description: Clarence ‘Clarrie’ Mackley has built his own patch of paradise, a small ranch devoted to Slim Dusty, Elvis and all things country and western. Living by his ethos of ‘do what you wanna do’, Mackley attracts tourists from all over to the world to his colourful place in Horsham, western Victoria.
